original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo antovassaṁ cārikaṁ caranti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyaḥ antovassam cārikam caranti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo antovassaṁ cārikaṁ carissanti haritāni tiṇāni ca sammaddantā, ekindriyaṁ jīvaṁ viheṭhentā, bahū khuddake pāṇe saṅghātaṁ āpādentā”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ antovassam cārikam carissanti haritāni tiṇāni ca sammaddantāḥ eka indriyam jīvam viheṭhentāḥ bahū khuddake pāṇe saṅghātam āpādentā ati

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: assosum kho bhikkhuniyaḥ tesam manussānam ujjhāyantānam khiyyantānam vipācentāna

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti
katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ antovassam cārikam carissanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo antovassaṁ cārikaṁ carantī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ antovassam cārikam caranti iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo antovassaṁ cārikaṁ carissanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ antovassam cārikam carissanti
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī antovassaṁ cārikaṁ careyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī antovassam cārikam careyya pācittiyam ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti

original: purimaṁ vā temāsaṁ pacchimaṁ vā temāsaṁ avasitvā.
analyzed: purimam vā temāsam pacchimam vā temāsam avasitvā

original: kukkuṭasampāte gāme gāmantare gāmantare āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: kukkuṭa sampāte gāme gāmantare gāmantare āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Agāmake araññe addhayojane addhayojane āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: agāmake araññe addhayojane addhayojane āpatti pācittiyassa
